price: (28) And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā anzalnā ʿalā qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina al-samāi wamā kunnā munzilīna
